phrases: Good morning.
This is Morioh Radio,
brought to you again today by your neighbor, Kai Harada.
Our first song of the morning is this...
All right, let us eat.
Oh, yes.
I have a present for you.
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Episode 21 Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1
Mr. Kira... Um, Mr. Kira?
Mr. Kira, if you are not busy, would you like to have lunch with us?
Sorry, but I will have to pass.
I need to go deliver these documents.
Goodbye.
Give it up!
He never wants to hang out.
Whenever we invite him out somewhere,
I cannot tell if he is really having fun or not.
Yoshikage Kira, age 33, single.
He is serious about his work and gets it done efficiently,
but the guy lacks any passion.
He is not a bad guy, but he just does not stand out very much.
Hey, what are you so grumpy about?
The new girls at work just invited me to lunch, that is all.
I promised that I would have lunch with you,
so there is no way I would go with them.
You heard me decline immediately, did not you?
Have I ever left you alone?
Hm?
Now, stop worrying about it,
and let us pick out some sandwiches together.
Katsu Sandwich
Come on, which one do you want?
Is not the bread wonderfully soft?
The sandwiches at this shop
use bread that is freshly baked at 11 AM, so they are really popular.
They are usually sold out by 1 PM.
You can feel how warm they are, even through the wrapper.
The katsu in the katsu sandwiches are freshly fried, too, and so crispy.
Oh, no.
You broke though the wrapper, and now the sauce is spilling out.
You naughty girl.
But now this sandwich has a hole in it,
so let us buy the one below it.
Thank you very much.
Morioh is such a beautiful town...
Could there possibly be another town this wonderful?
It almost feels like we are on a picnic.
She is getting a bit ripe.
I guess it is about time to break up with her...
Time to sever ties.
Sever ties...
Maybe I will go find a new girl, one who is on vacation or something.
Oh, it is just a dog.
Shigechi!
Oyo?
Josuke, Okuyasu!
Hey, perfect timing, Shigechi.
Sorry this is out of the blue, but please lend us some lunch money.
We forgot to bring money.
Huh?
What are you talking about?
You guys should have your share from the lottery.
That money's in the bank.
It is a pain to have to get money from the bank just for some lunch.
A thousand yen will cover both of us.
Yeah.
Come on, please?
We will go to the bank right after school.
Hey, that bag...
You have got a sandwich from St. Gentlemen!
They actually were not sold out?
You cannot have this!
This is my lunch.
Oh, fine.
I will lend you a thousand yen...
That is the spirit!
Thanks!
I am going to keep an IOU for this in my planner,
so do not skip out on me.
You are the one who skips out all the time!
Let us see...
June 24th.
Well, anyway, thanks again, Shigechi.
Lent 1,000 yen...
Lent?
Later!
Um, how do you write the kanji for lent again?
Lent...
Lent
Well, whatever.
I will just write it in hiragana.
I do not know how to write Josuke or Okuyasu in kanji, anyway.
Huh?
M-My sandwich...
Wh-Where is it?
Oh, it is right there.
I feel like it is further away than it was before, but whatever.
Th-That is...
Hey, Josuke, Okuyasu, wait!
You need to put your thumbprints on this IOU!
Your thumbprints!
What?
That little brat!
He mistook my bag for his and took it?
Jeez, what a pain.
How do we even put our thumbprints on it?
You know, you cut your thumb with a knife...
Y-You do not need to be so dramatic.
Fine, I will just take your signatures.
Hey, let us hurry up and go to St. Gentlemen.
They are going to sell out.
This is not good.
If he opens that bag...
She is wearing the ring I bought her.
And my fingerprints are on her...
With the police's investigative skills,
it will just be a matter of time before they trace the ring back to me.
I, Yoshikage Kira, have never left a single clue in the last fifteen years.
And I am not going to let that kid do that for me!
Josuke, let us hurry.
Yeah.
I will be waiting outside.
What should I do?
I will just have to take it from him.
The best thing to do is to swipe it without him noticing.
Shigechi!
You are super lucky, damn it.
The St. Gentlemen sandwiches are already sold out!
Damn it!
Oh, I see.
So they sold out.
Well, that is too bad.
In that case, I guess I would not mind selling you mine for 10,000 yen.
You are such a damn cheapskate.
I guess we do not have a choice.
Let us go to Hokaben, Josuke.
Hokaben, huh?
The stuff we could get for 500 yen each with a drink
would not really fill us up.
If we get school lunch as usual, it will be plenty, though.
Koichi said he was getting school lunch, too.
No way!
He is with Yukako Yamagishi, is not he?
Why do I have to eat lunch with a happy couple?
Not to mention, with the lunches there,
the meat's only about a millimeter thick,
and who knows what that stuff in the miso soup really is?
Hey, there are a lot of drinks in the prep room in my school's gym.
The gym teacher always sneaks coffee and tea from there.
All of the teachers are in the faculty room during lunch,
so I sneak in through the window sometimes and take some.
Want To just go buy lunch and come with me?
What the heck?
Are you stealing from the school?
That is pretty cheap.
We can at least buy our drinks.
I am not that greedy.
See ya!
And I was trying to be nice...
See ya.
Oh, and pay me back my thousand yen tomorrow!
Oh, pardon me!
I was not watching where I was going.
Sorry about that.
Crap...
It is good that he parted ways with his friends,
but he is heading back to school.
He is planning to eat it at school...
What should I do?
They were calling him Shigechi, right?
There is no doubt he will open that bag in a matter of minutes...
This is extremely bad.
Now, then...
I should be able to eat my lunch in peace here.
Whoops!
I almost forgot!
Before I eat my sandwiches, I need to brew my coffee.
Since I am here, I am going to have some coffee before I leave.
You are a lucky boy, Shigechi.
If you had seen what was inside, I would have had to get rid of you.
Hey, Josuke!
This is it!
It is smaller than I thought...
Wh-What?
They just said they would not come here!
Shigechi, you here?
Shigechi!
Oh, hey.
It is Okuyasu and Josuke.
We decided we would have some coffee after all.
Because we got the 500-yen Makunouchi bentos!
Hmph.
After calling me greedy and a thief...
You have got some nerve!
Now, now, do not be so stubborn.
People tend to change the way they think over time.
What should I do?
Eliminating one of them would be easy, but not so with three.
Damn it!
And she is only a few dozen centimeters away...
Hey, Shigechi, get me a drink, too.
I would actually like Japanese tea instead of coffee.
Is there any black tea?
Like milk tea?
Blech.
Makunouchi with milk tea?
That is gross.
Damn it!
He is planning to eat his lunch up there.
At this rate, he is going to open the bag in front of them!
Aw, it is soy sauce again.
The katsu here always come with soy sauce.
Huh?
You are supposed to eat katsu with soy sauce.
What?!
You idiot!
You are supposed to eat it with tonkatsu sauce!
If you used soy sauce, the tonkatsu sauce would lose its namesake!
Who cares about that?
Yes!
Wh-What?
Crap!
What?
Morioh Landmark 7 Bakery St. Gentlemen
How to get there: Get off of the bus bound for Morioh Budogaoka High School and walk two minutes.
It is a bakery on the Green Road leading from the station.
It is popular because of the varieties of bread made there using a stone oven.
Customers include students, housewives, and office ladies.
Their most popular items are their sandwiches, which always sell out.
Crap!
What?
Hey!
What are you doing, Josuke?
Hey!
You were not trying to steal my sandwich, were you?
No!
Do not be stupid.
There was a weird sound that got my attention,
so I was just taking a look.
Do not you dare touch it!
There is no way you would just look at it!
I know you are going to say,
Their teriyaki chicken sandwich is my favorite, Shigechi.
Give me a bite!
You sure are a greedy little guy.
You got my tea yet?
Where is my tea?
Do not forget, I want milk tea.
I am just about to make them.
Now!
I did it.
Here you go.
I brought your Japanese tea and milk tea.
Sweet.
Thanks!
What is with you?
Wh-Where did you put m-my sandwich?
Huh?
Oh...
Looks like it is gone.
But we do not know what happened to it, right, Okuyasu?
Yeah.
Stop messing around!
How could you not know?
You are the only ones here!
No, we seriously have no idea!
Seriously, we are not messing around.
No joke, we really have no idea.
Y-You jerks...
I-I am really going to get mad!
We are telling the truth!
You really need to stop.
Why would we take your sandwich
We will find out the truth soon enough!
I just need my Harvest to check the room!
You are such a pest!
Yeah, go ahead!
Do it!
Look as much as you want.
We would not steal your stupid sandwich.
What?
I cannot see what they are doing from in here.
What is that brat trying to do?
Hey!
I know someone is in the prep room!
That is the gym teacher!
Let us get the hell out of here, Shigechi!
B-But my sandwich!
Now's not the time for that!
Hey, come back here!
Damn you, little brats.
I thought it was strange that my tea and coffee
kept disappearing so fast.
No wonder.
I need to be more careful about locking the door.
That was rather messy,
but I got through this hard situation, and was able to get her back.
I always have to wonder if I am protected by luck...
And if I do things with careful consideration and in a bold manner,
I have a feeling that I can live a pretty happy life.
That was close.
I am so glad you came back to me.
Found it!
Why does someone I do not know have my sandwich?
Why is an adult that I do not know sneaking around my middle school?
Could it be that you are talking to me, little boy?
I have no idea what you are talking about.
This is my sandwich.
I just bought it at St. Gentlemen.
No, that bag is mine!
There are reasons why I know!
They are reasons you would not understand, though.
Take it back, Harvest!
Wh-What?
What is going on?
The bag is being pulled...
Wh-Wha?!
Wh-What...
My sandwich...
Is this... a r-r-real human hand?
Oh, dear.
It seems you have seen it.
It also appears, little boy, that you have the same power I do.
You can see my Harvest?
H-Hey, what is this hand?
Why are you walking around with just a hand in a bag?
Are you by yourself?
You two friends...
I believe you called them Josuke and Okuyasu?
Do they have a power similar to yours?
Hey!
Do not move!
If you move even a bit, I am going to attack!
You are a really creepy guy!
Do not come any closer to me!
I get a really creepy, unfamiliar feeling from you!
Do not move!
Do not move from there!
My name is Yoshikage Kira.
I am 33 years old.
My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are,
and I am not married.
I work as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores,
and I get home every day by 8 PM at the latest.
I do not smoke, but I occasionally drink.
I am in bed by 11 PM,
and make sure I get eight hours of sleep, no matter what.
After having a glass of warm milk
and doing about twenty minutes of stretches before going to bed,
I usually have no problems sleeping until morning.
Just like a baby, I wake up without any fatigue or stress in the morning.
I was told there were no issues at my last checkup.
Wh-What are you talking about?!
I am trying to explain that I am a person who wishes to live a very quiet life.
I take care not to trouble myself
with any enemies, like winning and losing,
that would cause me to lose sleep at night.
That is how I deal with society,
and I know that is what brings me happiness.
Although, if I were to fight, I would not lose to anyone.
Basically, Shigechi,
you are a troublesome thing that would hinder my sleep,
therefore my enemy.
Th-That is...
Deadly Queen... is what I have named it.
I am going to eliminate you now before you have a chance to speak,
so I can sleep soundly again tonight.
Episode 22 Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
Episode 22 Yoshi kage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
